ygData.subject: Where to hunt at 12?
ygData.msgSnippet: OK, I am almost through the horrible level 11 and looking forward to the wonders of level 12 and the 4th circle spells it comes with. I have been in the
ygData.messageBody:
OK, I am almost through the horrible level 11 and looking forward to the
wonders of level 12 and the 4th circle spells it comes with.

I have been in the process of moving the past week (and it will continue for
the next couple of days) so I haven't had time (and now lack a phone) so I
can't play as much; however, this will be fixed in a couple of days.

This leads me to thinking about EQ and about what I should do once I get
12... so I ask you guys, what are some good suggestions on where and what to
hunt once I reach 12??

I normally play solo or with a wizard friend of mine who is around the same
level (sometimes with a slightly bigger group) so what is good solo and what
is good for a small group. I am a DE; therefore, I have no real desire to
go to Faydwer.

In addition, what spell casting strategies do you guys use?

Thank you,
Azerin who can't play EQ right now so he wants to plan what he will do once
he can play again
